snippet: Special operations forces arrested 24 people Wednesday who were suspected of planning a violent independence campaign for the wealthy northeastern Veneto region.
abstract: Italian special operations forces arrest 24 alleged secessionists suspected of planning a violent independence campaign for the wealthy northeastern Veneto region.
lead_paragraph: Special operations forces arrested 24 people Wednesday who were suspected of planning a violent independence campaign for the wealthy northeastern Veneto region.

headline.main: Italy: 24 Suspected of Secessionist Plot Are Arrested
